Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
Represents a flight and manages passenger bookings and pricing.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Creates a new Flight instance with capacity and price.

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate)
      Creates a new Flight instance with basic information.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the flight
      flightNumber - The flight number
      origin - The origin airport/city
      destination - The destination airport/city
      departureDate - The departure date

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double basePrice)
      Creates a new Flight instance with capacity and price.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the flight
      flightNumber - The flight number
      origin - The origin airport/city
      destination - The destination airport/city
      departureDate - The departure date
      capacity - The maximum number of passengers
      basePrice - The base price for the flight

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger(Customer passenger) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a passenger to this flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - The customer to add as a passenger
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the flight is at full capacity

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(Customer passenger) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes a passenger from this flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - The customer to remove
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the passenger is not on this flight

    • hasDeparted

      public boolean hasDeparted(LocalDate systemDate)
      Checks if the flight has departed based on the system date.
      Parameters:
      systemDate - The current system date
      Returns:
      true if the flight has departed, false otherwise
